title: JSON Schema for VecNet Experiment Specification

base.description: Experiment Template (Experiment Base). Template or boilerplate for the scenario xml files. Includes placeholders that will be replaced with actual parameter values.

basefile.description: Filename that will be used as Experiment Template. Can't be used together with base

^*$.description: List of arms in this sweep
List of parameter placeholders that comprise this arm

^@*@$.description: Value for parameter placeholder applied when this arm is used

oneof.title: Combinations
oneof.description: Definition of combinations of sweeps that will be generated by Experiment Creator. All combinations of sweeps are listed if array represenation is used

oneof.title: Combinations
oneof.description: Definition of combinations of sweeps that will be generated by Experiment Creator. Cross-product of arrays is used as list of scenarios
